data.message: MC SILK !! <<<<------- He is faster then Eminem. Listen to RAP NOBODY

replies.message: No one has ever heard of that rapper,since u kno of a fast rapper ur gon throw him out there like it matters,there's lots of faster rappers than em,but none of them are relevant..twista, busta,bizzy bone,Royce and plenty others.but em kills them in actual popularity
He may be faster but he couldn't wipe the sweat off EMs balls. Tho he'd prolly wanna
This MC silk, he sounds like McDonald's started a luxury clothing line...

Who cares whose the most "popular" it's about being real with skills ! Ain't got fuck all to do with popularity actually and yeah it does matter that other people have skills to showcase also, that's an ignorant thing to say to be perfectly honest. I'm an eminem fan but u ain't crawling up his backside and sucking his dick!
May the rap god strike you down !!!
Mc silk is faster on blahblahblah on no point n meaning...lolz that y emenem is the rap god
And Youngblaze is faster than all after proving it with over 350 words in 1 minute, but it doesn't matter.
Em or Guinness is not saying he's the fastest. They are saying he had the most lyrics in a song on the top 20 billboard. And the most lyrics in 15 sec. Clip.
